remarks: A homomorphism of groups is linear.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 31-Dec-2014.)
statement:
ghmlin.x $e |- X = ( Base ` S ) $.
ghmlin.a $e |- .+ = ( +g ` S ) $.
ghmlin.b $e |- .+^ = ( +g ` T ) $.
ghmlin $p |- ( ( F e. ( S GrpHom T ) /\ U e. X /\ V e. X ) -> ( F ` ( U .+ V ) ) = ( ( F ` U ) .+^ ( F ` V ) ) ) $.
